pages.text:
Hello there!
Welcome to Beachside, where good times, ocean breezes, and great food await! I‚Äôm Dee, your new owner! I‚Äôm thrilled to finally make my dream a reality and to bring a lively and laid-back atmosphere to Ormond Beach. We are family-owned and operated and passionate about serving up the freshest meals and creating the best experience in town. Come join us on the weekends for some dancing and indulge in our delicious meals featuring secret recipes you won't find anywhere else. Prepare yourself for a culinary adventure at our vibrant new venue, The Lounge at Beachside! Located downstairs, you can groove to live music or head upstairs to our deck for breathtaking ocean views and refreshing sea breezes. With mouthwatering dishes, a lively atmosphere, and memories waiting to be made, it's the perfect spot to unwind and enjoy the best of beach life! Join us and experience the fun‚Äîyour table is waiting!
DINE, DANCE, REPEAT.
Gallery Strips

Awesome family owned ...great food...fun music ....a must visit !!!

‚Äú
First time here, best of the best! Great music and service
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
‚Äú
Nice owners, very involved! Great bands, music starts early and it‚Äôs not too loud!
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
‚Äú
Amazing evening ! Music, upbeat & fantastic food! We enjoyed the Ribeye and it was the best we‚Äôve had in Daytona Beach! Owners are super friendly and staff on top of things. What an awesome experience. Won‚Äôt be our last!!
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
‚Äú
Love the atmosphere here. The food and drinks were wonderful. We had the opportunity to meet the owners. They were great as well. They recently took over ownership in September and they are doing a great job in the neighborhood. He must frequent this local and locally owned business. Live music all weekend and great food and drinks Wednesday through Sunday.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
‚Äú
So many good things to say: Soulfire band will keep you dancing and Rockin‚Äô. Our servers, being a foodie I have to brag on the food. Been here about five times and had five different food items and you will not be disappointed.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
‚Äú
Great food, great bands, great owners and staffs !!!
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
‚Äú
Had a wonderful meal. The Ribeye is so awesome very friendly atmosphere and the band Soulfire was very entertaining. Best date night the wife and I have had in a very very long time would love to congratulate the owners Mike and Dee on a job well done keep up the awesome hard work your staff is very organized.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
‚Äú
My family came here in October and were very impressed with this place, so we decided to come back for NYE. I tell you the food is amazing, we‚Äôve had the Pork tacos, Chicken/pork skewers with rice, burgers, shrimp and oh so delicious feta fries. Real chef with great food not just bar food. The staff are always friendly and steady checking on us, Kiana and Ocean are super fun. The owners Dee and Mike are very gracious hosts and very awesome people. The downstairs lounge is so beautifully decorated and what a great view upstairs on the deck. They have a nice variety of entertainment with live music, open jam and just music playing on the house speakers. We come to Daytona from Georgia often and look forward to visiting them each time. We would definitely recommend coming here.
Food: 5/5  |  Service: 5/5  |  Atmosphere: 5/5
‚Äù
‚Äî Google Review
